article.name: Hazard
article.description: I\'d just got a new computer running, my mini-iTX infact, I\'d installed Paint Shop Pro, I had nothnig to do, I drew this. A biozard warning type thing, with a closeup of some kind of virus/bacteria. Completely fabricated from PSP\'s drawing tools from a blank canvas.
article.keywords: virus, hazard, psp, paint, fabrication, canvas, biohazard.
